mapper.select: select l.id,u.picture,u.user_name,l.create_time,l.information from sys_log l left join sys_user u on l.user_id = u.id where l.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by l.create_time desc limit 0,#{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select l.id,u.picture,u.user_name,l.create_time,l.information from sys_log l left join sys_user u on l.user_id = u.id order by l.create_time desc
select count(*) from sys_log where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_read = 'N'

select u.id,d.name as dept_name,u.login_name,u.user_name,u.picture,u.modify_time,u.status,u.locked from sys_log l left join sys_user u on l.user_id = u.id left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.id where custom_id = #{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by l.user_id order by max(l.create_time) desc limit 0,10

select u.id,d.name as dept_name,u.login_name,u.user_name,u.picture,u.modify_time,u.status,u.locked from sys_log l left join sys_user u on l.user_id = u.id left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.id where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by l.user_id order by max(l.create_time) desc limit 0,10
mapper.update: update sys_log set is_read = #{isRead,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
